name: Thork the Relaxed
response: Thork is a laid-back fellow, preferring to nibble steadily over gobbling everything at once. He sees insurance as a respectable companion, even sharing his last grubby meal with it—a gesture so unexpected it's almost charming. Pharma? Just white noise in the background, while crypto exists but barely raises an eyebrow. Thork would rather scratch his ear than give either much thought—truly, a troll who knows how to chill.
